website_summaries.verdict: This versatile knife is up for any task and compact enough to carry with you wherever you go.
pros: Lightweight frame with a pocket clip for easy carrying
Razor-sharp blade that's ready to use right out of the box
cons: The black color will begin to flake off the knife over time

customer_reviews.title: good feel in the hand
customer_reviews.text: first impression out of the box: good feel in the hand... I dont always like skeleton frame knives, but the everything is nicely finished(rounded corners on the handle) for a solid comfortable feel. Came sharp out of the box. I accidentally touched the tip and it gave me a little cut, noting bad(my fault should have been more careful) clip is a bit tight, but in time it'll work in....
customer_reviews.author: joshua a maddox

customer_reviews.title: Not a one thumb flick opener
customer_reviews.text: Way too stiff, my thumbs are sore from trying to open it one handed, even after greasing the joint its never going to be a one thumb flick opener. Nice quality, good looking, lightweight knife that is just barely whole hand sized (what I wanted), with a very sharp tanto blade and serrations. If it just had a an extended tang/flipper to facilitate the advertised "one handed opening", I would rate it higher and might become my EDC, but at this point wished I would have tried the Uzi Responder I or S&W Extreme Ops Tanto
customer_reviews.author: SteveinKC

customer_reviews.title: Gerber is now sending out "B Stock" or "Factory Seconds"
customer_reviews.text: I love Gerber products BUT they actually sent me out a Factory Second - B Stock product. The Safety selector was glued shut basically - 20+ lbs of pressure to move it back to the unfolded position but more importantly - LOOK at the machining "gouge/scratch" in the attached picture - HOW did this make it past the Quality Group?
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this knife!!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is an absolute pleasure to hold in your hand! The handle is in the thicker side, but it's still easy to fit inside of your pocket, the frame lock feels sturdy and I have no fear that the blade would come down slicing my fingers off as I am using it. I love how it is single hand open, though it takes some loosening up first, and the 2.9 inch blade is just perfect for California legal standards, and I might buy my girlfriend this knife as well!
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket knife!
customer_reviews.text: You won’t find anything better for the price imo. Gerber is a great brand I have nothing but good things to say about my past gerber knives. Also I have no idea why a lot of these ppl are saying this knife is hard to open/close??? I don’t find it hard to open or close at all it seems normal to me. I guess if you’re THAT lazy then just get a spring assisted knife so it opens up for you..
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: A great little knife. It's compact, sleek, has a nice coating and came very sharp right out of the box. The knife feels solid and well built. The opening and locking mechanism are VERY solid, almost to the point it can be difficult to unfold/fold it. It may just be a matter of using it more to loosen it up, but I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday knife
customer_reviews.text: Having a pocket knife comes in handy and this one is the perfect size. I read a lot of people have trouble opening it with one hand, but that just comes with practice and technique. Yes it's out of the box, it'll take a bit for the knife to loosen up. But nothing that a flick of the wrist cant fix. Definitely can't go wrong with Gerber.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Decent Job Gerber. Clip needs Consideration
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to knife. I was concerned by the low price that the item would either be too small or not hold an edge. But since it is a Gerber, I went ahead. I was impressed with the quality. I deducted a star due to the engineering of the clip that is used to hold the knife to a pocket or belt. The openings in the handle catch on the pocket or belt as you try to attach the knife. There is no provision to mount the clip on the other side where interference is a nonissue. I plan to purchase more of these knives as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a little stiff to open. Almost always need two hands. The blade is extremely thin and dulls quickly. However, it sharpens easily and weighs almost nothing. Also fits a large hand pretty nicely. I'd spend a little more money on a better knife if I could go back, but it has done what I've needed it to do for months now so it hasn't been a waste
customer_reviews.author: Seth123

customer_reviews.title: Solid pocket knife, recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little pocket knife. Went with the 2.5" model due to local concealed carry laws, would have liked a slightly larger one. Blade is very sharp. The opening was initially a bit stiff, but with a couple weeks of use, it's loosened to an ideal level. Blade locks perfectly, no wiggle whatsover. The belt clip is extremely snug - can hook it to my jeans pocket easy enough, but anything thicker can be a hassle. It's light weight, but feels solid when held. Given the price, I highly recommend it. I've had it about two months at the time of this review. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: not-a-one

customer_reviews.title: Needed something small and light but sturdy enough to actually use when required
customer_reviews.text: I got this knife to use as an EDC. Needed something small and light but sturdy enough to actually use when required. The size of the knife was great, and carrying it around in my pocket didn't bother me at all. It was decently sharp right out the box, but the paint did have multiple smudges all over and scratches, as if it had been used. Not a big deal considering the price, but still a bit concerning. Overall, it's a great little knife for EDC.
customer_reviews.author: Savpreet P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife!!! Light weight with perfect blade length. I lost my knife that had the skeleton handle, but it was a drop edge style. Enjoying the Tonto style very much. Blade action opening and closing is smooth. Came as sharp as it could be. Can’t go run with a Gerber knife, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sharp and well built
customer_reviews.text: Its small and well made. Blade isnt big but its sharp. Do wish the belt clip was easier to take off. The screws arent a standard head so it can be taken of if you have the right driver to fit the screw head.
customer_reviews.author: edgar herrera

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blade at a reasonable price point
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blade at a reasonable price point. I got the mid range blade and has stayed relatively sharp through about a year of minimal use. One thing i reccomend for beginners is that if you get gunk or anything sticky on the blade, use rubbing alcohol to get it back to the slick smooth feel. the handle feels good in my hand. Though the spring is starting to get harder to move as time goes on, making me use more force to slickly release the blade with a hand whip.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kay

customer_reviews.title: Inspires awe
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality, as one would expect from Gerber. I've been a long time fan of Boker knives because of their prices and designs, but a recent Boker purchase left me dissatisfied. This one is built much better and I got it for about the same price as the Boker knife I also recently got. Looks pretty awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: andoryuu3

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: My father always recommends Gerber, and so when I was looking for a knife, I found these. Very happy with it. sturdy, sharp, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Gerber Knives Rock.
customer_reviews.text: Good beefy knife for the price, yet when clipped inside your pocket you do not even feel it. Very sharp, and have had no problem cutting though much of anything. I like the one inch of smooth blade in front of serrated portion of the knife. I have owned many Gerber brand knives and leather men tools over they years and have never been disappointed. A great gift idea for any male.
customer_reviews.author: Greatlinks71

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: My issue with this knife is that the thumb "nubs" are super long, and rake against my hand when I reach into my pocket. It may sound dumb, but it's not. Other gerbers I have owned had shorter "nubs" Also, if you are trying to close this with one hand, be careful of your fingers. the blade can snag you fingers through the handle if you aren't careful
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: Very shsrp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife which I wanted to keep but had to give to my son-in-law because I was not strong enough to close it one-handed with my thumb moving the frame to unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t go anywhere without it. Just add Krav Maga and you’re all set. This blade holds an edge too.
customer_reviews.author: Taliq Kayuqtuq

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this knife for 6 months and I love it. I use it at work when I need to cut open a box. I also use is for misc. things throughout the day. It is rugged and well built. It has a nice clip that fits tightly on to your pant clothing. I see this knife lasting a very long time. I sharpened it once but it really did not need it. It was sharp out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC Knife
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful knife. THe blade comes from the factory with a razor sharp edge. Great size to fit in my pocket and not be in the way of when I reach in. Very lightweight and has a great balance. Like others say, it does come with a stiff opening. Not the worst thing in the world but worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNamee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my police son. My husband retired police officer recommended this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Impressive value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this size compared to the smaller Gerber Paraframe. This one is a tad big for EDC its still light and the lock engages correctly. The small one I had (clip point) wouldnt lock so I had to press in the frame lock. Im not a "knife guy" so I wont regale you with technical jargon. Its much better than I expected for under $20.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Kelsey Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's Gerber,  Nuff said
customer_reviews.text: The knife is lightweight convenient sharp. I carry it in a case every day. I'm a car salesman and along with my diesel multipliers this item is ever so handy. Top notch quality. Some have said this is made in China. I did notice it doesn't have the made in the USA that Gerber is usually proud of. If it is from China that's a disappointment but it's still top quality. But I do fear for its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: M. Trail

customer_reviews.title: ... and the use/abuse I put it through its a good little knife
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the use/abuse I put it through its a good little knife. As a woman I love how it fits in the pockets of my woman's designer jeans. I have to sharpen it often but I use it for everything and it goes with me everywhere. The other thing I like is how well set the screws are in it. Past knives I've had don't last long when it comes to the screws. It's also very easy to open and close even with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Razor sharp out of the box, I think my ...
customer_reviews.text: Razor sharp out of the box, I think my sharpener actually dulled it. Clip is a little tight to get on your pants pocket but also makes it harder to fall off. Will have to grind down the thumb stud on the clip side as well as I've scratched some floors wearing it while working.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fleming

customer_reviews.title: The knife is nice but will occasionally come open on it's own while ...
customer_reviews.text: The knife is nice but will occasionally come open on it's own while on the belt. It seems that the thumb-studs on the blade which aids in opening the knife can catch on clothing causing the blade to partially open. Other than the afore mentioned issue, the knife is actually pretty nice. Good weight and right size. The blade has stayed fairly sharp.
customer_reviews.author: WJ in TX

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: lightweight, sharp, clean cut Cons: little hard to open. (Hoping it loosens up over time.) All around I would recommend buying. I've had the same little Gerber pocket knife for YEARS finally decided to trade up and I'm extremely happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Its a gerber.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the worst knife. Looks better then the gen 1 also
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. I lost my other one and this was a more inexpensive update.
customer_reviews.author: Meriah Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The knife refuses to close up, even after watching the company video repeatedly. Save yourself the headache and find something else.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Another fine Gerber knife
customer_reviews.text: I still have, and use frequently, the Gerber knife I was issued in the Army 40 years ago. I also have and use several Gerber multi-tools. Based on my experience with the brand, I bought this knife as a general purpose, daily use knife. It's opening action is stiff and closing it requires two hands, but that's OK. The last thing I want in my pocket is a knife that just falls open.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight everyday carry
customer_reviews.text: Got medium sized. Very lightweight. Not assisted open which is good [legal in nj] pretty sharp out of package [will shave hair off your arm as a test for sharpness] opening is a little stiff but to be expected brand new
customer_reviews.author: Joel Antipuna

customer_reviews.title: I love it but when I got it the handle piece ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but when I got it the handle piece broke when I'm trying to close it properly. Edit: I received a replacement for it and it totally works properly as it should. Gerber are the best they reached out gave me a newer one and I didn't have to pay extra for it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loooove love love this knife. I haven't had one this nice in years. Its exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife....
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. It’s a perfect size and weight..
customer_reviews.author: Donald Corkum

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: i got this as a present for my friend who is really into knives but i borrowed it a few times to use as well and it works great. i love the contour handle and it makes it easy to cut things even with small hands. my friend was very pleased with it as well and was happy with the gift. definitely a nice present for knives enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but sharp, solid, easy to hold. Great knife for the price
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Gerber
customer_reviews.text: Great pocket knife to have. I was hesitant of the handle when I bought it, but it is ROCK SOLID. No bending or flexing at all. Came razor sharp out of the box. The perfect size as it meets all the laws in my state as far as blade length. The clip is solid too.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knife. It looks sharp! The only compliant I have is the outside is smooth, with no grip. It can be hard to open the knife with one hand because it's so smooth. Others wise, I'm really happy with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wesley

customer_reviews.title: I really love this knife.
customer_reviews.text: Great EDC pocket knife. Doesn't get better than Gerber in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Josay

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap pocket knife
customer_reviews.text: Nice sharp knife right out of the box. Shaved hair off my arm!
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good everyday knife to carry around. Light and durable. Also, goes through the washing machine and drier really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Cool design
customer_reviews.text: A really cool design, just keep in mind the steel is kinda soft, and may require resharpening depending on how frequently you use it
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Bawankule

customer_reviews.title: It's a great knife for the price and I have always appreciated ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great knife for the price and I have always appreciated the Gerber brand. It's very sharp compact enough to fit in pocket for every day use. The problems have with it is that it's hard to open with the thumb pin but not too hard. The major problem I have is that the metal piece that locks the blade when your using it is nearly impossible to open and I have a very difficult time to fold the knife up again . Overall I really like this knife
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Solid China made Gerber
customer_reviews.text: Bought this knife to carry when I go running and it was very lite. Even though it is made in China, it is still a pretty decent knife for the price. *it does have a clip.
customer_reviews.author: Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice daily carry. A little stiff on opening, but reliable
customer_reviews.author: Jovan

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife, Glad I Made The Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, great price, knife is well built! Don't regret getting medium size. Closed knife is 4 inches in length.
customer_reviews.author: Charleston C. Guyton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Knife is sharp and good looking but impossible to open and close one-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: I bought one like two years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought one like two years ago, but loose it at the airport. At the begining it is hard to open with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jan trbík

customer_reviews.title: Much better with the older versions of this knife
customer_reviews.text: This new design for the paraframe has a weird quirk where the blade isn't locked in the open position and wiggles a bit. Much better with the older versions of this knife.
customer_reviews.author: D. C

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Gerber I have bought and it did not disappoint. Light weight, easy to open, and very sharp. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good work knive
customer_reviews.text: I like Gerber knives. I've bought 2 other Gerber knives before and both came out the package pretty sharp. This knife was a little dull. I had to sharpen it time I opened it which isn't something that you should have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my son a few years ago and it still holding up perfectly. Still sharp also.
customer_reviews.author: Calibre .33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality little blade to carry all the time. Useful and good looking. Boyfriend was happy to receive this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great for EDC
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the Paraframe as one of my EDCs for years. Quality on this knife for the price can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Gothic_Divine

customer_reviews.title: Classic Gerber Quality
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and durable. Feels good in the hand. Not too long, yet long enough to pose a threat or get bigger jobs done. Stay with Gerber if you're a loyal customer, switch to them if you're not. Plus the looks are hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Baublitz

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size pocket knife. Been using this for months and it is still razor sharp.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for the price. I like that I am not worried about loosing it like some other more expensive pocket knifes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's a pocket standard for me
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable and sharpen seems to hold. It's one size up from the size I normally get but I'm a Gerber fan
customer_reviews.author: Jimihowdy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife. Lightweight. Easy to carry (I carry it daily). Easy to open and close. Cuts very well. All around, I am very happy with this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McGillick

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect & Fast
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Rec'd on time & it is just exactly what my nephew wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hopkins Everage

customer_reviews.title: ... this knife even though some of the reviews were great and some said it was difficult to open and ...
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this knife even though some of the reviews were great and some said it was difficult to open and close. I have had no problem opening or closing the knife and I am really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast so that deserves an A+ the knife looks much more better, cooler in person so A+. I personally find it hard to open with 1 hand, I've tried plenty of times and im not capable of doing it, but overall great little tactical knife. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Aragon

customer_reviews.title: smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: thought the knife was going to be a little bit bigger, still a great knife
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Came sharp enough to shave out of the box. The paraframe makes for a great edc knife. One of the greatest general pocket knifes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.author: BDD

customer_reviews.title: Solid Knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife and very lite weight. My only issue is the quick open thumb knobs on both sides of the blade are a little to big. I ended up grinding one side down so it didn't catch on my pants pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket knife
customer_reviews.text: Best pocket knife out there. Love the frame lock design. Blade is very sharp on arrival, action is smooth. Does not dull easily. Not my first Paraframe knife.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, heavier than I expected but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Handy size. Well made. Came sharp, unlike other Gerber knives I've gotten. Black color is stealth.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: great product for the price! but the only thing i would say that not good about this knife is the tip of the knife. i tested it stable the table at my house ( table is made out basically cardboard paper from Ikea and the tip is bend and broke off the knife. Solid knife to handle and very snappy and durable. but not the tip...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My second Gerber knife. I love it just as much as the last one!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The knife is deceiving small but is easy to get to and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: JWSpoon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Knife
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only drawback is they are made in China, but I trust Gerber products. Super sharp and holds it's edge. Feels very sturdy and is slim enough to wear inside the waist of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Makes it through the occasional laundry cycle when left in pockets, all with no harm. Typical high Gerber quality we expect.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little on the heavier side but a good knife.
customer_reviews.author: Bnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: What I expected from a cheap knife, decently sharp, opens easily, only complaint is the lack of cutting surface on the straight blade, it's almost useless with how little there is but the serated portion is great.
customer_reviews.author: RVR

customer_reviews.title: It's a Gerber.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, sharp, and not spring loaded, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: GAC

customer_reviews.title: Gerber Tactical Knife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tactical knife. The serrated edge will cut through rope no problem. Knife stays sharp pretty well, but I'm not sure on how long exactly since I sharpen it regularly. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cory R.

customer_reviews.title: nice sharp durable knife
customer_reviews.text: Good knife. Sharp! Durable! Perfect size! Belt clip for easy access! Opens easily with one hand! Legal to carry in MY city!
customer_reviews.author: IglooMan

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: The handle is glossier than you'd think. Blade looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Inman

customer_reviews.title: Good EDC. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Flicks open with great ease. Handle was a bit smooth to grips. Added some GT-5000 Grip tape to the handle. Great knife for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A very good looking knife. The frame is one piece with the actual handle "bending" to lock the blade it feels very sturdy and has a resounding click, this is a wonderful blade.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Z

customer_reviews.title: great knife, very sharp
customer_reviews.text: was a bit smaller than i expected when compared to other Gerber folders. Over-all great knife. great at what it does. dropped it on my boot and it pierced the leather..so i recommend it as another good knife from Gerber.
customer_reviews.author: Yousai

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Clip, opening and closing are way too stiff. Thumb stud too pronounced, abrasive when reaching into pocket
customer_reviews.author: Warren Zdan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Literally carry it on me everyday, its slim and fits perfectly in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to Gerber I always maintain high expectations. This knife was purchased to accompany my tackle box and it has maintained it's edge after heavy use. Prompt shipping and a quality blade earned this knife 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I am in the Coast guard and needed a durable work knife. This is perfect. Too bad they do not float as that is what happened to the last one.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: Ths is small enough & light enough to make it a good carry.
customer_reviews.text: This is light, small enough to make it easy to carry and it is simple. It is also sharp and the serrated part is very handy. This is also a good looking blade.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Olmsted

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: I got this took it out of package it's a little stiff to open at first but it becomes smoother after time it was very sharp very light and slim I forget its in my pocket
customer_reviews.author: Mike3398

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife and love the look. This is the 4th Gerber Paraframe knife I’ve purchased and they never let me down. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Schmoker

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be larger in pic than in actuality. Good knife overall though would make a purchase again from this buyer
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Good little knife. The factory edge is very good, but the opening action needs to be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Knife is very small and the lever action is very stiff. The knife itself looks awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Solid and lightweight knife
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but solid knife. Throw in some great pricing and it's a perfect deal
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: it is a good size for me
customer_reviews.text: it is a good size for me. It is a little large for the pocket but the smaller one is too small. Good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rosenblitt

customer_reviews.title: Great size for my large hands
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp. Great size for my large hands. And still comfortably small in the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Harley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Functional and well constructed -- exactly what you expect from Gerber
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good Knife
customer_reviews.text: The gerber knife is great, used it on some tough products and it stood up, needs a sharpening out of box. Only Con is the blade action is still but with a little loosening of the screw and some use it will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

product_meta.title: Gerber Paraframe I Knife, Tanto Point, Black [31-001731]
product_meta.description: A tactical take on a Gerber classic, the Paraframe Tanto features a black coated tanto style blade. Like the original Paraframe, The Paraframe Tanto is an open frame knife with a locking blade that is lightweight, easy to clean and opens effortlessly. Built with a smooth stainless steel handle and a clip for secure wear, the Paraframe Tanto is an excellent everyday carry knife for the tactical professional.
feature_bullets: Black titanium nitride coating for excellent corrosion resistance
Dual thumbstuds for easy one-handed opening
